Class VoxelTissueRegion

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Tissues
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines Cartesian coordinate voxel with x,y,z ranges.

public class VoxelTissueRegion : ITissueRegion
